channel.title: I Need MYSQL Database Help
channel.description:
ok i have smf forums (1 atm) and i qould like to add another smf forum to my website but i dont know how to do the mysql thing because the person who owns the webhosting site did it for me and wont log on msn n e more so i need somebody to possiblly give me a step by step tut on what to do.
[u][b]What My MYSQL Database Looks Like[/b][/u] [URL=http://rs2armor.com][IMG]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/4748/mysqlpg1zz5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://rs2armor.com][IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/9868/mysqlpg2fv6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://rs2armor.com][IMG]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/6251/mysqlpg3xd8.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]And Then When i go to my new forums in which i would like to create it looks like this:[/b][/u] [URL=http://rs2armor.com][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/3176/mysqlhelp1lt9.png[/img][/URL]
can sombody please help me do the MYSQL so the forums will work, and if possible can you tell me how to make them so like if somebody is logged on my first pair of smf forums the'll be logged on my second like mopar has www.moparisthebest.com/smf & moparisthebest.com/smf

item.title: I Need MYSQL Database Help
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

On another topic

umm… press create new database? its really simple[/quote][quote=“moparisthebest, post:2, topic:16692”]with smf you can even put multiple forums on one database, all you have to do is enter a different table prefix, the default is smf_, enter whatever you want

iv done this its not working i need a step by step tut please nothing else is working
